title: Drawing, "Study of a man; Study of", possibly June 1857
markings: Stamps: center left: Museum for the Arts of Decoration Cooper Union
inscribed: Upper left in graphite: 2 yellowish green/ 3-laky dull red/ Hat-yellowish light; and below: Hair; lower right, in graphite: over and under the leaf quite polished/ wrinkled/ stems, light clear green very/ conspicuous; lowerleft, in graphite: large leafed plant/ sometimes leaves will measure /4 feet - growing in warm countries/ on road to Quito

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Study of a man; Study of", possibly June 1857.
possibly June 1857. Graphite
Support: paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-226.
